alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Orange; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 12:02AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Orange, southwestern Caledonia, north central Addison, southeastern Chittenden and Washington Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1202 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fayston, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Barre, Montpelier, Calais, Plainfield, Orange, Websterville, East Montpelier, Lincoln, Marshfield Village, Waitsfield, Berlin, Fayston, Groton, Middlesex, Marshfield, Barre Town, Northfield Village, Warren, Ryegate, and Cabot. This includes the following highways... Interstate 89 between mile markers 44 and 61. Interstate 91 between mile markers 112 and 120. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Orange; Washington
